column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=What do you expect Project Chanology to accomplish and when ?
#Text=I am not an Anon , and know little about the movement .
#Text=But I was extremely impressed that Anonymous brought out thousands of people to protest around the world on short notice .
#Text=From what I 've seen , I believe they can accomplish a lot .
#Text=I hope a few more protests , then work on Scientology 's tax exemption , which I believe is a very vulnerable area for Scientology .
#Text=Project Chanology is a strong force with able people .
#Text=It can do a lot .
#Text=Anonymous utilized criminal tactics , why should such organizations be trusted and regarded as credible ?
#Text=Us long-time critics were initially very frightened of Anonymous .
#Text=You can tell that from Wise Beard Man 's first video but since then it appears that Anonymous has dropped the original things we were seeing .
#Text=So I see it as self-policing happened and things are on track now .
#Text=I do not condone anything but peaceful , legal methods .
#Text=And now Anonymous is promoting that as well , so I am happy .
#Text=What should be the next step for the Anonymous movement ?
#Text=Wow .
#Text=That 's not for me to say .
#Text=I 'm not a part of it .
#Text=But I do hope they will do as they have been , which is listening to us who have been in the field for a long time .
#Text=You can listen and learn from what we 've done , then decide where to go from here .
#Text=My one wish would be to go after Scientology 's tax exempt status in the US .
#Text=Otherwise I have confidence that Anonymous will find the right path .
#Text=What are your crimes ?
#Text=religiousfreedomwatch.org tried to find my crimes , most of what they came up with is about my dad .
#Text=So I like to tell people I 'm Scientology-approved !
#Text=They could n't find any crimes : )
#Text=What keeps you going ?
#Text=And how much fair game have you got got ?
#Text=I 've been deposed 3 times by Scientology attorneys .
#Text=My home has been picketed .
#Text=My business has been picketed twice .
#Text=In Clearwater
#Text=I was followed sometimes daily by PIs [ Private investigator ] .
#Text=Lynn Farney yelled at me " we will raid you and sue you !

#Text=What advice would you give to those who get  Fair Gamed " ?

column1: #Text=Go to the police right away .
#Text=Keep a record of everything .
#Text=Carry a video camera .
#Text=I always had a video camera with me in Clearwater , even going to the grocery store .
#Text=And another thing I liked to do is post everything that happened online .
#Text=One time I posted " if I disappear , here 's the plate number of a car that 's been following me ... "
